section.title: Tintri
section.para: Tintri VMstore is a smart storage that sees, learns and adapts for cloud and virtualization. Tintri Cinder driver will interact with configured VMstore running Tintri OS 4.0 and above. It supports various operations using Tintri REST APIs and NFS protocol.
